text:
Hey guys, already part of this group but just an update. I'm Alastair and recently switched my focus from launching a startup to looking to work full-time in venture capital (you guessed right its coz of Covid). I've recently got an internship with an Indian-focussed VC fund. What I also do in my downtime is help with presentation work (pro bono). This is because I get to work with exciting ideas and also understand businesses which I think pays for itself in a way. Here's a link to my presentation work - <http://alastairpavrey.com/portfolio/presentation-portfolio/>

If any startup founder or someone building a cool idea (particularly consumer, fintech or esports) is looking for some help do DM me here. Look forward :)

attachments.title: My presentations -
attachments.text: I’ve worked on almost 200+ presentations across various industries ranging and topics from pitches, deep dives, company overviews, etc. To give an idea of my expertise, I’ve added 4 presentation that cover the major types of presentations I’ve worked on as follows RPACS – Corporate Presentation for a Company Secretary Firm Gamethon – Concept Presentation for a nation-wide gaming competition Onsyde – Brief Intro into... Read More

text: Hello! Not all of our members are guys. In an effort to be more conscious of the language we use to address each other, why not try “Hey, folks,” or “Hey everyone” instead?
